Uses of Class
moulton.scalable.clickables.Clickable

Packages that use Clickable
Package Description
moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.geometrics
The geometrics package contains classes pertaining to primarily to aesthetics, such as lines and polygons.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.clickables

    Subclasses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.clickables
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Button
    A menu component that is a simple rectangular button with optional frontal text saved as Button.text.
    class  RadioButton
    A button where only one in the group can be clicked at a time.

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.containers

    Fields in moulton.scalable.containers declared as Clickable
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Clickable MenuManager.clicked
    The Clickable that was last clicked.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.containers that return Clickable
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Clickable MenuManager.findComponent​(java.lang.String idToFind, Panel startPoint)
    Finds the clickable component with the specified ID.
    protected Clickable MenuManager.findComponent​(java.lang.String idToFind, Panel startPoint, Panel ignore)
    The recursive method to find the component with the specified ID.
    Clickable MenuManager.getClicked()
    Returns the currently selected clickable component.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.containers with parameters of type Clickable
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected abstract void MenuManager.clickableAction​(Clickable c)
    Implement to add functionality to any clickable components in the menu managed.
    void MenuManager.componentLostFocus​(Clickable c)
    Called when the component lost focus and needs to report changes.
    protected abstract void MenuManager.lostFocusAction​(Clickable c)
    Implement to add functionality to any clickable components in the menu managed once they lose focus.
    void MenuManager.setClicked​(Clickable clicked, int x, int y)
    Sets MenuManager.clicked to defined.

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.draggables

    Subclasses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.draggables
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.geometrics

    Subclasses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.geometrics
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PolygonalButton
    A menu component button in the shape of a polygon as opposed to a rectangle

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.texts

    Subclasses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.texts
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  StaticTextBox
    In some instances, the user will find it useful to select and/or copy text from a text box, but should not be able to edit its values.
    class  TextBox
    This is a text box that users can enter data into, the available characters for which is defined by TextFormat.

  • Uses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.visuals

    Subclasses of Clickable in moulton.scalable.visuals
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AnimatedButton
    A button that displays an Animation on its button face.
    class  ImageButton
    A button that displays an image instead of text on its button face.
